actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1979 of the Revised Statutes (42 U.S.C. 1983) to permit the recovery of attorneys' fees in certain Civil Rights actions.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Permits the recovery of attorneys' fees by the prevailing party specified civil rights actions. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 1983)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1979 of the Revised Statutes (42 U.S.C. 1983) to permit the recovery of attorneys' fees in certain Civil Rights actions.
